title: Email with attachment does not appear in Thunderbird
content: My wife sent me an email with a small word file to my Yahoo and I see the email when I log into Yahoo but not Thunderbird. I have always been able to receive emails with attachments before so don't know what to do. I'd be fine if I saw the email without the attachment but no email shows up at all in Thunderbird, only Yahoo email.
creator: jamesvelasquez1

title: Font Color Changes Within an Email
content:
Hi all,

I'm writing an email reply and wanted to answer questions in a red font. So, my top line reply was "see below in red" and then I wanted to type Yes or No in red after each question. I couldn't even copy and paste from a word document with the font in red.

In Thunderbird, I clicked on the color checker, typed in FF0000 for the color code and clicked yes. Then the color selecter boxes on the menu went right back to white.

Any ideas?
creator: dmsolomon
